snippet: With “Rosewater,” Jon Stewart directs a film about Maziar Bahari, a reporter imprisoned and tortured in 2009 in Iran shortly after the disputed election there.
abstract: Comedian Jon Stewart wrote and directed movie Rosewater to tell story of journalist Maziar Bahari, imprisoned for months by Iranian government after reporting on 2009 elections; among film's goals is illumination of ongoing struggle between individuals and oppressive governments determined to stop flow of information to public.
lead_paragraph: With “Rosewater,” Jon Stewart directs a film about Maziar Bahari, a reporter imprisoned and tortured in 2009 in Iran shortly after the disputed election there.
